subject: Nascar Sprint Cup Series
Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: With his car sliding all over the track, Jeff Gordon held off his teammate Jimmie Johnson over a thrilling last 10 laps Tuesday to win the rain-delayed Advocare 500 Nascar Sprint Cup race at Atlanta Motor Speedway in Hampton, Ga.
snippet: With his car sliding all over the track, Jeff Gordon held off his teammate Jimmie Johnson over a thrilling last 10 laps Tuesday to win the rain-delayed Advocare 500 Nascar Sprint Cup race at Atlanta Motor Speedway in Hampton, Ga.
